longInfo:
Passport required.
- Passports and/or passport replacing documents must be valid
  for at least 120 days beyond the period of intended stay.

Visa required, except for A max. stay of 30 days for nationals
of Equatorial Guinea.
Minors:
- Minors (under 18 years of age), entering or departing
  Micronesia (Federated States), must hold a power of attorney
  issued by parent(s) or legal guardian(s). This applies when
  traveling:
  - alone; or
  - with one parent; or 
  - with a legal guardian; or
  - with an adult other than a parent or a legal guardian. 
Additional Information:
- Extension of stay possible.
- Visitors are required to hold proof of sufficient funds to
  cover their stay.
Warning:
- Visitors must hold return/onward tickets
